rules_text:
When Stratos Sentry enters, target opponent chooses a nontoken creature they control. You integrate that creature. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
As long as a creature card with power 3 or less is integrated onto Stratos Sentry, it gets +1/+0 and has flying.
notes:
!canoncard Gatekeeper of Malakir
 101: Integrating is now optional.
